item.title: About This Page
item.description: You’ve reached a relatively empty page belonging to Saulius Lukauskas. I’ve replaced my old blog with something more of a placeholder for now which is designed to hold my up to date contact details. As of this day I am based in Munich and work as postdoctoral Researcher at Helmholtz Zentrum MÃ¼nchen in Institute of Functional Epigenetics. You can contact me through my LinkedIn profile or Twitter.
